name: Suddenly...Mutants!
description:
Your only objective is to survive!

Suddenly Mutants is an endless top-down survival shooter I made to learn the workings of Construct 2. Clay.io is integrated to provide a leaderboard system. Vie for the number one spot!

A Voltisoft Production: www.voltisoft.com

Visit my blog: snowcreations.voltihost.com
